text: ochrome c oxidase deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of cytochrome c oxidase deficiency:  - Cincinnati Children's Hospital: Acute Liver Failure  - Cincinnati Children's Hospital: Cardiomyopathies  - Genetic Testing Registry: Cardioencephalomyopathy, fatal infantile, due to cytochrome c oxidase deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Cytochrome-c oxidase deficiency  - The United Mitochondrial Disease Foundation: Treatments and Therapies   These resources from Medlin
